comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Date written on negative is 9/17/13 -- 2nd day of play of the USGA National Open Championship played at the Brookline Country Club. See NYT of Sept 17, 1913 query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9F02EFDA163DE633A... and Sept 19,1913 query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9407E4D7113BE633A... for reports on the tournament.

comment.author: 34904489@N07
comment._content:
swanq:

Thanks for both the date and the links to more information. We will expand this photograph's description to reflect these details.
